text: His offering was one silver platter weighing a hundred and thirty shekels,7:13 130 shekels is approximately 3.3 pounds or 1.48 kilograms; here and throughout this chapter. and one silver bowl weighing seventy shekels,7:13 70 shekels is approximately 1.76 pounds or 797.8 grams; here and throughout this chapter. both according to the sanctuary shekel and filled with fine flour mixed with oil for a grain offering;
